title: REORIA Women's Summer Sexy One Shoulder Formal Long Dress Wedding Guest Elegant Sleeveless Ribbed Bodycon Maxi Dresses
description: 🌸Fabric: Made of Modal (Sirospin) 93%+Spandex 7%, super breathable and buttery soft, great stretch, lightweight and comfortable to wear, this formal maxi dress allows for comfortable movement while hugging your body in all the right places. Its fitted design ensures you look stunning at any event—be it a casual outing or a formal gathering

🌸Design: This chic maxi dress can be worn either as a stylish one shoulder dress or as a off-shoulder dress , sleeveless, long length, the bodycon fit flatters every curve. While the beautifully crafted ribbed fabric adds a touch of sophistication. Not too tight to walk and so cozy to wear all days

🌸Matching: Long bodycon tight dresses for women easy to pair with high heels, bags, sandals, sun hats and necklace, set off your sexy and flattering. Pair the long cute dress with jackets, cardigans in spring or fall, also warm and stylish
🌸Occasions: Easy to dress up and dress down. Great for daily life, birthday, formal occasion, wedding guest, holiday, date nigh, night out, party, dating, brunch and so on

🌸Size & Care : Please refer to the size chart before your order. Cocktail dresses for women hand wash in 30 degree water, hang to dry in the shade, no bleaching. For a better dressing experience, we recommend iron in low before wearing
